channel.title: Crappy errror... my server doesnt work
channel.description:
when anybody logs on my server they got disconnected right after htey l0g in ... it isnt anything special it looks normal they log in and then it says like when they log out...
[code]- Bobs island - .. Online! Connection accepted from LULIPHERE: 1344. Client type: high memory version UserId: 67318167 LULUSERNAMEHERE is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 Game saved for player LULUSERNAMEHERE ClientHandler: Client LULUSERNAMEHERE disconnected. [/code]

item.title: Crappy errror... my server doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

[quote=“bobsisland, post:8, topic:201671”][quote author=magma828 link=topic=266340.msg2201318#msg2201318 date=1208825894]

Do they have a client error? The client is very particular about packets and ordering, and most servers don’t do NPCs very well.

Thats what I said… -.-
[/quote]

and i answered it -.- but i copied client.java to it and i needed item2.java cause it needed sometyhing in it then i also needed npchandler, playerHandler and player. buti copied these files and then i got diconnected logging in so its in the files the error is…[/quote]

I mean a client side error (eg in MoparScape), not in your Client class server side.

Read full topic

O O O … good idea ! then if it doesnt work after i did that then i kno ITS MY CLIENT.JAVA!!! YAY! lol then can you find out where it possible could be if its in client.java?
